 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַע‎</span> **verb** ==disturb== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***move to and fro***; perhaps transposed from Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***disturb***, [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 8</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** [[Job.26.12|Job 26:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכֹחוֺ רָגַע הַיָם‎</span>; ***Participle construct*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>65d. 116 g. x</sup>), [[Jer.31.35|Jer 31:35]] = [[Isa.51.15|Isa 51:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹגַע הַיָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶהֱמוּ גַלָּיו‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** ==denominative from== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶגַע‎</span> ***make a twinkling***, only 1 singular Imperfect cohortative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַד אִרְגִּ֫יעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺן שָׁ֑קֶר‎</span> and ***while I would twinkle*** (= ***only for a moment:*** compare [[Job.20.5|Job 20:5]]) is the false tongue opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּכּוֺן לָעַד‎</span>, [[Prov.12.19|Prov 12:19]] (compare [[BDB#De|De]]); and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי אִרְגִּ֫יעָה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרִיעֶנּוּ מֵעָלֶיתָ‎</span> ***I will twinkle and*** (= I will ***in a moment***, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:120g»§ 120g</sup>; compare [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]) chase them away from it, [[Jer.49.19|Jer 49:19]] = [[Jer.50.44|Jer 50:44]]. ([[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>§ 86 as substantive</sup> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶגַע‎</span>, of the very rare type ***'aqtîl***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span>-; as [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:90»§ 90</sup> f.) 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַע‎</span> **verb** ==be at rest, repose== (probably = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***return***, properly ***return to rest***, after wanderings, etc.); — 

**Niph\`al** ***imperative*** 2 feminine singular [[Jer.47.6|Jer 47:6]] (of sword) be gathered into thy scabbard, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵרָֽגְעִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָדֹ֫מִּי‎</span> ***repose***, and be still. **Hiph\`il a.** transitive ***give rest to; — Infinitive construct*** [[Jer.31.2|Jer 31:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָלוֺךְ לְהַרְגִּיעוֺ‎</span> I will go to ***give him*** (Israel) ***rest***, [[Jer.50.34|Jer 50:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַעַן הִרְגִּיעַ אתהֿאדץ‎</span> (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִ‎</span>, see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53l»§ 53l</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Deut.7.24|Deut 7:24]]</sup>; read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַ‎</span>); [[Isa.51.4|Isa 51:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ומשׁפטי לאור עמים אַרְגִּיעַ‎</span> usually I will ***cause*** my judgment (religion) ***to repose*** as, etc. (i.e. I will establish it; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים‎</span> [[Isa.42.4|Isa 42:4]]); but metaphor strange: hence [[BDB#Bachm|Bachm]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] (joining to v[[Isa.42.5|Isa 42:5]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִדְקִי‎</span> (&lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲקָרֵב‎</span> [[Isa.46.13|Isa 46:13]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְגִּיעַ אַקְרִיב‎</span> ***in a moment*** (I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַע‎</span> Hiph\`il) will I bring near, etc., [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְגִּיעַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרֵב‎</span>, [[BDB#Oort|Oort]] [[BDB#Ry|Ry]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרֶנַע קָרֵב‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐγγίζει ταχύ</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** intransitive ***rest, repose***, [[Deut.28.65|Deut 28:65]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ובגוים ההם לא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַרְגִּיעַ‎</span>, [[Isa.34.14|Isa 34:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם הִרְגִּ֫יעָה לִילִית‎</span>. So [[Eccl.36.31|Eccl 36:31]]. 



 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַע‎</span> **verb** ==harden== (Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***coagulate, congeal:*** possibly a special development of √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span>); — [[Job.7.5|Job 7:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַע עוֺרִי וַיִמָּאֵס‎</span> my skin ***hardens***, and (then) runs again (II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָאַס‎</span>), of the ulcers in elephantiasis.
